articles.title: Have Cosmetic Facial Fillers? Watch Out for Side Effects From Moderna Covid-19 Vaccine - International Business Times, Singapore Edition
articles.description: The FDA advisory committee reviewing the Moderna vaccine has noted specific side effects involving several trial participants who have cosmetic facial fillers.
